name: SUNSET SURVIVAL STATION
description:
SUNSET SURVIVAL STATION is a time-lapse survival with roguelike and rpg elements in a space post-apocalyptic world.
Collect radionuclides and mutokens to improve your car and figure out what's going on at the station.

Expect:

  • Different machines with their own unique characteristics, skills and weapons
  • Big branch of abilities and improvements for each machine
  • More than 50 different weapons and items to help you race
  • Mutants, chiefs and butchers
  • Mysterious obelisks and holographic keys
  • Cows and cotton candy
  • Original soundtrack
  • Support for mouse, keyboard, controllers.
